backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a Klondike tableau drop‑zone bug and affected frontend file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend Solitaire modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the SolitairePage in a dark-themed container.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/componen: Card rendering component supporting face-up/back states, locking, selection, hinting, and drag events.
Toolbar with buttons for new game, undo, hint, scores, and preferences.
Displays move count or a disabled notice depending on preference.
Dialog for enabling timer, move tracking, and ask‑again preferences.
Displays formatted elapsed time or a disabled notice based on settings.
Dialog component letting users configure timer, move tracking, and ask-again settings before starting a new game.
Renders a solitaire pile with support for tableau stacking, waste and foundation behavior, selection, hints, and drag-and-drop.
Displays leaderboard dialogs showing top times and least-move playthroughs with scrollable lists.
Win dialog showing current game results and top leaderboard entries with timing and move stats.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/hooks/us: React hook providing a game timer that tracks elapsed seconds and resets per game instance.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/preferen: Manages user solitaire preferences in localStorage, including timer, move tracking, and ask-again options.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/results/: Tracks completed playthrough results in localStorage and derives sorted best-time and best-move leaderboards.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Utilities for serializing, validating, and handling drag-and-drop payloads for solitaire card movement.
Generates a hint by scanning waste, tableau, and stock for the first legal move.
Implements snapshot-based history with push, pop, and undo helpers for game states.
Defines deck creation, shuffling, dealing, move validation, and stock drawing logic.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/Solitair: Main Solitaire UI container managing game state, dialogs, preferences, timer, and results.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Declares core Solitaire types including cards, game state, selections, and helpers.
Checks whether all foundation piles are complete to determine a win.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/useSolit: React reducer and hook managing game state, moves, history, hints, and UI state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hooks for managing authentication and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating that Solitaire uses no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature metadata for a solitaire game project.
